      • median3

        protected static <E extends java.lang.Comparable<? super E>> E median3​(E[] a,
                                                                       int left,
                                                                       int right)
        quicksort and helpers ------------------------------------------- median3 sorts a[left], a[center] and a[right]. it leaves the smallest in a[left], the largest in a[right] and median (the pivot) is moved "out-of-the-way" in a[right-1]. (a[center] has what used to be in a[right-1])
